title: Classic Sans
content:
Hello guys,

it's clssic - I know.  
I just couldn't refresh my memory.  
Help please.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063636im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ScreenShot005_5557.jpg)

Font: 

 Guildford 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063636/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: agamartin

comments.content:
Thanks Ryuk,  
but it seems there are the differences in "B" and "R" which are crucial for us.

When you look at the CSS of [the source](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063636/http:/www.hardgraft.com/pages/terms) of your sample, you will discover that the font they used is one of those that Ryuk mentioned, namely [Guildford](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063636/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/guildford-pro/). Differences in appearance are likely to be due to the size of the sample and/or the font rendering not being the same in every browser.
